alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Decatur; Gove; Graham; Greeley; Logan; Norton; Rawlins; Sheridan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 9:51PM CST until November 25 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Total snow accumulations ranging anywhere from 1 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions associated with accumulating snow on all area roadways. This includes the Interstate 70 corridor in eastern Colorado and northwest Kansas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Little or no snow may fall late tonight and early Saturday morning, additional light snow accumulation is expected during the day on Saturday. Snow will end from west to east Saturday afternoon. Easterly winds will remain at or below 10 mph. Blowing and drifting snow are not anticipated. Wind chill readings as low as 5 degrees below zero are expected Saturday night into Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
